name: Slow as a snail
description:
Slow as a snail was made with the intent of creating a game as painful as possible to speedrun but it ended up being painful no matter how you play it

not convinced yet?? look at some of our reviews

"this game made me kick the bucket" -The queen of england

"this game made me quit" -ign

"i cant make that jump" -Inarsy

"Game of the year. got my grandma to leave the house" -me
